subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees can clinch the A.L. East with a sweep in Sunday’s doubleheader and a loss by the Toronto Blue Jays after taking game two of Saturday's twin bill against the Red Sox.
snippet: The Yankees can clinch the A.L. East with a sweep in Sunday’s doubleheader and a loss by the Toronto Blue Jays after taking game two of Saturday's twin bill against the Red Sox.
